title: Sure, here's a curated list of 20 articles up to 2021 that focus on various aspects of event-focused natural language processing (NLP). These articles cover a range of topics including event extraction, event detection, temporal information processing, and more
**"Event Extraction from Text: A Survey"** by Thien Huu Nguyen
A comprehensive survey of methods and techniques for event extraction
**"Joint Event Extraction via Recurrent Neural Networks"** by Thien Huu Nguyen
Discusses a model that jointly extracts event triggers and arguments using RNNs
**"A Survey on Temporal Information Extraction from Text"** by Manish Agarwal, Prateek Jain, and Partha Pratim Talukdar
Reviews methods for extracting temporal information, which is crucial for understanding events
**"Event Detection and Domain Adaptation with Convolutional Neural Networks"** by Yubo Chen
note: Liheng Xu, Kang Liu, and Jun Zhao (2015

title: Explores the use of CNNs for event detection and domain adaptation
**"Event Extraction Using Distant Supervision"** by Heng Ji and Ralph Grishman
Introduces a distant supervision approach for event extraction
**"Jointly Extracting Event Triggers and Arguments by Dependency-Bridge RNN and Tensor-Based Argument Interaction"** by Yubo Chen
note: Liheng Xu, Kang Liu, and Jun Zhao (2017

title: Proposes a joint model using dependency-bridge RNNs for event extraction
**"Event Detection and Co-reference with Minimal Supervision"** by Alan Ritter, Mausam, and Oren Etzioni
Discusses methods for event detection and co-reference resolution with minimal supervision
**"Leveraging Linguistic Structure For Open Domain Information Extraction"** by Michele Banko
Focuses on open-domain information extraction, which is relevant for extracting events from diverse texts
**"A Survey on Event Detection Techniques in Social Multimedia"** by Xueliang Liu, Feida Zhu, and Enhong Chen
Reviews event detection techniques specifically in the context of social multimedia
**"Event Extraction as Dependency Parsing"** by Bonan Min
Proposes a novel approach to event extraction using dependency parsing techniques
**"Temporal Information Extraction and Shifting the Focus to Event Understanding"** by James Pustejovsky, Kiyong Lee
Discusses temporal information extraction and its importance for event understanding
**"Event Extraction via Dynamic Multi-Pooling Convolutional Neural Networks"** by Yubo Chen
note: Liheng Xu, Kang Liu, and Jun Zhao (2015

title: Introduces a dynamic multi-pooling CNN model for event extraction
**"Event Extraction with Generative Adversarial Imitation Learning"** by Yubo Chen, Liheng Xu
Explores the use of generative adversarial imitation learning for event extraction
**"Event Extraction with Structured Prediction Models"** by Sameer Pradhan
Discusses structured prediction models for event extraction
**"A Survey on Event Detection in Twitter"** by Abdelghani Benharref
note: Mohamed El Koutbi, and Mohamed Quafafou (2018

title: Reviews various techniques for detecting events in Twitter data
**"Event Detection and Summarization in Social Media Streams"** by Alan Ritter
Focuses on detecting and summarizing events from social media streams
**"Event Extraction from Biomedical Text Using a Stacked Generalization-Based Approach"** by Makoto Miwa, Rune Saetre
Discusses event extraction in the biomedical domain using a stacked generalization approach
**"Event Detection and Tracking in Twitter"** by Arianna Dâ€™Andrea
Explores methods for detecting and tracking events in Twitter
**"Event Extraction from Newswire Articles"** by Heng Ji and Ralph Grishman
Focuses on techniques for extracting events from newswire articles
**"Event Detection and Summarization Using a Probabilistic Model"** by Xuerui Wang, Andrew McCallum
Introduces a probabilistic model for event detection and summarization
These articles provide a solid foundation for understanding the various approaches and challenges in event-focused NLP
